name: MicroQrDecoder
summary: Decodes Micro QR codes from a module grid.

members.name: TryDecode
members.summary: Attempts to decode a Micro QR code from an exact module grid (no quiet zone).
members.returns: true when decoding succeeded; otherwise false.

parameters.name: modules
parameters.description: Square matrix of Micro QR modules (dark = true).

members.signature: static bool TryDecode(BitMatrix modules, out MicroQrDecoded result)
